name: jpeg-exif
description: Use for parse .jpg file exif info (including GPS info.).

scripts.test: npm i istanbul mocha chai coveralls && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage && npm uninstall mocha chai istanbul coveralls

author: s@zhso.net
